patterns_discovered: Threaded HTTP server for handling OAuth callbacks
Stateful request handler with class-level tracking of authorization code
Detailed HTML response generation for success and error scenarios
Port availability checking before server startup
gotchas_discovered: Potential race conditions with class-level state tracking
Hardcoded localhost and port might cause conflicts
Timeout mechanism relies on thread joining
recommendations: Consider using a queue or thread-safe mechanism instead of class-level state tracking
Add configurable port and host options
Implement more robust timeout and cancellation mechanisms
Add logging for better debugging and traceability
